kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and/or ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
